level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice veterinary medicine.
Chapters 29 (Animal Facilities) and 33 (General Rules: Funeral Directors, Veterinarians, and Interior Designers) of this title shall supplement this chapter.
The provisions of this chapter prevail in the event of a direct and irreconcilable conflict between this chapter and chapter 33 of this title.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง 6(1) the Veterinary Practice Act of 1982, D.C. Law 4-171, D.C. Code ยง 2-2725(m) (1987 Supp.), and Mayor’s Order 86-117, issued July 21, 1986, 33 DCR 5690 (September 12, 1986).
